contentfulPost.title: Knock Out your Burnout
contentfulPost.metaTitle: How to recognize signs of burnout and actions to prevent it

metaDescription.metaDescription: Are you feeling a loss of motivation? Do you feel helpless, tired, and drained most of the time? You might be suffering from burnout. Here are a few helpful tips on noticing and tackling burnout.

The measures to stay inside and limit exposure has changed everyday life. Working from home, ordering groceries online, and even booking virtual appointments for medical needs are becoming the normality. The environment variety has been limited and the social contact comes with moral obstacles. Days blend into weeks and weeks into months and so often we are left wondering what day it is. This monotonous lifestyle of repetition can cause stress and fatigue which can often lead to burnout.
